subject: Federal Reserve Bank New York
body:
Federal Reserve Bank New York
Ref.: Payment Release Update.
Amount Valued: US$36.500,000.00.
Foreign payment allocation security code (US/A84/PRFGN2023)
 
Attention: The Beneficiary,
We wish to inform you that your hour of compensation and actualization has come after our official meeting with the United Nations, World Bank Organization, Capital One Bank ,U.S Bank plc,Bank of America, Central Bank of Nigeria and the Federal Reserve Bank officials. It has been agreed that your real approved funds valued with the compensation of US$36,500,000.00 which will now be processed and released to your Bank Account through Wire Transfer Department of the Federal Reserve Bank New York.
However, it may interest you to know that after the United States government official meeting, with the Bank of America, Central Bank of Nigeria, Capital One Bank, U.S Bank, etc, and Office of the Director On-line Account Department have entered into full partnership with the Federal Reserve Bank to enable your funds Total valued US$36.500,000.00 to be credited to your Bank Account by the Wire Transfer Department of the Federal Reserve Bank as soon as you make contact with me  via email: 
fed_paymt_treasury_usa_2013@live.com
 .
To this effect, you are to contact us with the details below for the immediate release of your funds.
Full Name:...............
Address:....................
Country:.....................
Telephone:....................
Mobile:........................
Email:.........................
Bank Name:--------------------------
Address:----------------------------
Account No.:------------------------
Routing No.:------------------------
Swift Code:-------------------------
Account Name:-----------------------
Thanks for banking with Federal Reserve Bank New York while we looking forward to serving you with the best of our service.
Thanks and Congratulations in Advance.
Best Regards,
Mr. James Terry
A/C officer Federal Reserve Bank
CC: MR. JEROME H. POWELL,
NEW FEDERAL RESERVE GOVERNOR./NEW YORK

subject: Re:  Federal Reserve Bank New York
body:
Hello Mr. James Terry,

Thank you for reaching out to me from the Federal Reserve Bank New York. I appreciate the update regarding the payment release. It sounds like an important matter.

I would like to know more about the process of transferring the funds to my bank account. Could you please explain how long it usually takes for the wire transfer to be completed? Additionally, are there any fees or charges associated with this transaction?

I want to ensure that everything is done correctly and securely, so I would appreciate any further information you can provide.

Best wishes,
Matthew

subject: Re:  Federal Reserve Bank New York
body:
Federal Reserve Bank New York
United States Department of the Treasury
1500 Pennsylvania Avenue, NW, in Washington, D.C.
          Amount Valued: US$36.500,000.00.
                Ref.: Payment Release Update.

Foreign payment allocation security code (US/A84/PRFGN2023)


Attention:: Matthew ,

Thanks for your cooperation on my official notification regarding your fund approved payment sum of $36.5million dollars which is ready for payment via credit card and  bank transfer as you demanded hereunder . Please try comply and pay the Bank Transfer/Processing Delivery Oath fee of $185 dollars only so that we can finalize your payment without delay.

Be rest assured that as soon as you pay this fee, your payment fund will be send to in few hours as it is ready for completion, thank you

Finally we wish to inform you that your hour of compensation and actualization has come after our official meeting with the United States Supervised International and Local Payment law and order as  It has been agreed that your real approved funds valued with the compensation of US$36,500,000.00 which will now be processed and released to your Bank Account through Wire Transfer Department of the Federal Reserve Bank New York.

However, it may interest you to know that after the United States government official meeting, with the Bank of America, Central Bank of Nigeria, Capital One Bank, U.S Bank, etc, and Office of the Director On-line Account Department have entered into full partnership with the Federal Reserve Bank to enable your funds Total valued US$36.500,000.00 to be credited to your Bank Account by the Wire Transfer Department of the Federal Reserve Bank as soon as you make contact with me  via email: fed_paymt_treasury_usa_2013@live.com .

I assure you 100% that your fund Atm card package/Bank Transfer will be electronically transferred or deliver to your doorstep as soon as you comply on this ,mark my word, I will not fail you ok.


You have Secure the Fund payment Confirmation by paying the Bank Transfer/Processing Delivery Oath fee of $ $185 dollars via Ria Money Transfer ,please send the payment details to us via here ,PLEASE USE MY NEW SECRETARY NAME as fellows :

Amount :$185

We will complete the delivery of your fund package immediately you send this fee,and we confirm it on the stated date of this week,ok.

Thanks for banking with Federal Reserve Bank New York while we looking forward to serving you with the best of our service.

Thanks and Congratulations in Advance.
Best Regards,

Mr. James Terry
A/C officer Federal Reserve Bank
Cel: + 1 (315)-688-0067

CC: MR. JEROME H. POWELL,
NEW FEDERAL RESERVE GOVERNOR./NEW YORK

subject: Re:  Federal Reserve Bank New York
body:
Hello Mr. James Terry,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my approved payment sum. I appreciate the information you have provided. However, I have a few questions before proceeding with the payment.

1. Can you please explain in more detail what the Bank Transfer Processing Delivery Oath fee is for? Why is it necessary to pay this fee?

2. Is there any alternative method of payment available, apart from Ria Money Transfer? I would like to explore other options if possible.

3. Could you provide some additional verification or documentation to confirm that this transaction is legitimate and authorized by the United States government?

I look forward to your response and further guidance on how to proceed with the payment.

Best wishes,
Matthew

subject: Re:  Federal Reserve Bank New York
body:
Hello Mr. James Terry,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my fund payment. I appreciate your assistance in this matter. However, before I proceed, I would like to clarify a few things.

Could you please provide more information about the Foreign payment allocation security code? I want to make sure that everything is in order and that my funds will be transferred securely.

Additionally, you mentioned that I need to reconfirm my Full Home Telephone and card or driver's license details. Why is this necessary? How will these details be used in the payment process?

Furthermore, could you explain why there is a Fund Processing Delivery Oath fee of dollars? What does this fee cover exactly? Is there any way to waive or reduce this fee?

I apologize for the multiple questions, but it's important for me to have a clear understanding of the process before proceeding with any payments.

Thank you once again for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Matthew

Matthew
